tosdr.case: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions
quoteText: The Sync Website may include links to third-party Web sites. These third-party Web sites may assign different cookies to you. Those cookies may be used to track your involvement with the advertising site. You may choose not to accept these cookies. Sync does not control these parties, and you should review their privacy policies to learn more about what, why and how they collect and use personal information.
